title: Minecraft Holographic Text Plugin
shortDescription: Getting Minecraft world to talk by adding holograms everywhere!
description: A Java-based Minecraft plugin implementing a new decoration system to the game. Full command-line tools for teleporting holograms, renaming them, editing text of them, changing color of text and much more.
reason: I needed a better decoration/explanation than signs for my Minecraft server. That's when I built this plugin to help me do that.
